Enquiries

Whether you’re looking to book a live performance, schedule singing lessons, or arrange a vocal workshop, please use the form below to send me a message. I’ll respond as soon as possible.

I offer private singing lessons from my home in Ewenny after school from Monday to Wednesday, with limited availability. Be sure to include your preferred time slots in your message.
